abstract: Goldman Sachs may be a bank holding company, but its private equity unit is ranked first place on Private Equity International’s latest list of the largest private equity firms, supplanting pure-play firms like last year’s winner, TPG.
snippet: Goldman Sachs may be a bank holding company, but its private equity unit is ranked first place on Private Equity International’s latest list of the largest private equity firms, supplanting pure-play firms like last year’s winner, TPG.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs may be a bank holding company, but its private equity unit is ranked first place on Private Equity International’s latest list of the largest private equity firms, supplanting pure-play firms like last year’s winner, TPG.

headline.main: Goldman Wins Top Spot in Private Equity Ranking
